nodes.text: The VF-72 gunner ship was a gunship model used by the time of the New Republic. When Tamara Ryvora needed a CoMar Tri-Tracker chip to repair anti-aircraft cannons on the Colossus refueling station, she believed one such chip could be salvaged from a VF-72 gunner ship or Y-wing starfighter.

The VF-72 gunner ship was first mentioned in "Synara's Score," a 2018 episode of the television series Star Wars Resistance. The vehicle is a reference to VF-72, an aviation unit of the United States Navy during World War II.
